issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
I have an install in an office env where we have migrated to network paths for user profile folder Documents and Desktop

h3. Actual Result
Can not start Android Virtual Devices

h3. Expected Result
I expect that I can start Android VIrtual Devices without panick
fields.summary: Ability to set home directory for android plugin

comments.body:
Hi ,
We tested the issue you reported. This is not a improvement issue. Android Virtual Devices  is working fine on home directory. I will mark this ticket as "resolved" since we can't reproduce it. However, feel free to reopen with additional information if you notice otherwise.
Thanks
